articles.title: Who Is Nikhil Gupta, Man Charged In Failed Plot To Kill Khalistan Terrorist - NDTV
articles.description: Nikhil Gupta, an Indian national, has been charged by US federal prosecutors with conspiring with an Indian government official to assassinate Gurpatwant Singh Pannun, a Khalistani terrorist who holds American and Canadian citizenship, on US soil.
articles.content:
The US has welcomed India's efforts to probe the matter.
New Delhi: Nikhil Gupta, an Indian national, has been charged by United States federal prosecutors with conspiring with an Indian government … [+3492 chars]

articles.author: Luc Cohen, Krishn Kaushik
articles.title: How alleged India plots to kill Sikh separatists in the US and Canada unfolded - Reuters
articles.description: The alleged plot to assassinate a Sikh separatist on U.S. soil began in May, with a text message between what the American indictment says was an Indian security official and an alleged drugs trafficker.
articles.content: NEW YORK/NEW DELHI, Dec 1 (Reuters) - The alleged plot to assassinate a Sikh separatist on U.S. soil began in May, with a text message between what the American indictment says was an Indian security… [+5566 chars]
